name: magento-glossary
description: A single page application for Magento Glossary

scripts.copy: echo '=> copying files' && ./node_modules/.bin/copyfiles index.html word-usage.html tooltip.html js/*.min.js js/templates/* css/* fonts/* images/* _site/ && ./node_modules/.bin/copyfiles -f _data/content-glossary.xml _site/data/
scripts.minify: echo '=>minifying files' && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -c -o js/glossary.min.js js/glossary.js js/glossary.page.js js/glossary.page.filter.js js/glossary.page.renderer.js js/glossary.tooltip.js && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -c -o js/glossary.tooltip.min.js js/glossary.js js/glossary.tooltip.js
scripts.convert: echo '=>converting excel file to xml' && python scripts/convert-excel-to-xml.py -i scripts/content-glossary.xlsx -o _data/content-glossary.xml
scripts.scss: echo '=> generating css from scss' && node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style compressed scss/glossary.scss css/glossary.min.css
scripts.deploy: echo '=> deploying glossary files' && npm run minify && npm run scss && npm run copy
